Text:
you say "This PDF file is encoded in 7-Zip format to reduce data transfer and download time"

This was quite unnecessary. 

size of the 7-zip file: 34.4 MB
size of the PDF file: 36.8 MB

I can d/l at speed 3 MB/s, so you "saved" me almost 1 sec, although the unpacking took more than 1 sec.

So, you created a complicated process which took more time than necessary. Advantage is zero.
